title: Miranda Lambert posts a sweet birthday tribute to her new husband Brendan McLoughlin
text:
Miranda Lambert is enjoying living a life of wedded bliss once again, years following her split from Blake Shelton.

The country star took to Instagram Monday with a sweet message for her new husband Brendan McLoughlin on his birthday.

The 35-year-old talent got remarried this January in a Tennessee ceremony to the charming NYPD officer.

Birthday boy: Miranda Lambert took to Instagram Monday with a sweet message for her new husband Brendan McLoughlin on his birthday

She posted a black-and-white photo of the two of them, captioned: 'Happy Birthday to the man that puts stars in my eyes.'

Last month, Lambert gave a shout-out to the cop during her concert in Atlantic City, to the delight of her fans.

'Something about country music is usually a sad song,' she told the audience in-between songs, according to Us Weekly. 'You gotta have them, sometimes the sad song gets you through a sad time, isn't that right?'

'Lucky for me, I’m not in a sad time anymore in my life,' the ex-wife of Blake Shelton told the crowd.

Newlyweds: She got remarried this January in a Tennessee ceremony to the NYPD officer

Secret ceremony: They tied the knot in a secret wedding, going public with the news on Valentine's Day

Happily remarried: The country star is enjoying living a life of wedded bliss once again, following her split from Blake Shelton

She then held up her left hand to show off her wedding ring and declared: 'Thank you to my sweet husband from Staten Island, by the way!'

McLoughlin was standing on the side of stage at the time and acknowledged his wife's compliment.

'But no matter what, sometimes you always go maybe in a dark room and drink a beer and sing a sad song and that's what I'm going to do, because I love it,' Lambert added before the band kicked into the tune.

The touching moment was the perfect transition to lead into her hit 2017 song Tin Man.

Romantic shout-out: Last month, Lambert gave a shout-out to the cop during her concert in Atlantic City, to the delight of her fans

Sad songs: The touching moment was the perfect transition to lead into her hit 2017 song Tin Man

In the track, which was written shortly after her divorce from Shelton in 2015, Lambert sings to the Wizard Of Oz character who doesn't have a heart.

Since then, Shelton has gone on to date The Voice co-star Gwen Stefani, while Lambert dated several musicians before meeting McLoughlin.

They tied the knot in a secret wedding this January, going public with the news on Valentine's Day.

McLoughlin has a son named Landon, who was born in November 2018, with his ex Kaihla Rettinger.
